name: Spades by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Spades on your iPad, iPhone or iPod.

Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. Spades is played with 4 players in 2 partnerships, 1 human player and 3 computer players. A regular deck of 52 cards is used. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

This game is best played on tablet devices.

Features:

* Real Spades rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
